section.title: usage.resource
section.para: usage.resource command interacts with service specific usage MBeans and Usage Notification manager MBean. usage.resource allows to manage usage sets and parameters, for instance get value of parameter or turn on JMX notification for certain parameter. General form of command looks as follows: usage.ra <RAEntityName> [SetName] <-operation[[arg] | [--option[=arg]]*]> Note that access to default set does not require [SetName] to be present.
For description of operations and supported options please refer to
